name: Goody on mushrooms + Hexcollie n Fyornulis - Cellsmosis (acid angelated)
description: Goody on mushrooms + Hexcollie n Fyornulis - Cellsmosis (acid angelated)

per_frame_init_1=decay=0.1;
per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=sx=1;
per_frame_3=sy=1;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=vol=(bass+mid+treb_att)*.3333;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=redsine=.5+.15*bass*sin(time*3);
per_frame_8=greensine=.5+.15*mid*sin(time*2);
per_frame_9=bluesine=.5+.15*treb*sin(time);
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=redif=if(above(bass,1.2),redsine,if(above(redif,.95),0,redif*.85));
per_frame_12=greenif=if(above(mid,1.2),greensine,if(above(greenif,.95),0,greenif*.85));
per_frame_13=blueif=if(above(treb,1.2),bluesine,if(above(blueif,.95),0,blueif*.85));
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=ib_r=redif;
per_frame_16=ib_g=greenif;
per_frame_17=ib_b=blueif;
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=wave_r=redif*abs(sin(redif));
per_frame_20=wave_g=greenif*abs(sin(greenif));
per_frame_21=wave_b=blueif*abs(sin(blueif));
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=zoom=zoom+.01*treb_att
per_pixel_1=//dx=dx+.01*sin(x*40+time);
per_pixel_2=//dy=dy+.01*sin(y*40+time*.972);
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=rot=rot+.01*sin(rad*time);
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=cx=cx+.1*sin(time*.9);
per_pixel_7=cy=cy+.1*sin(time*.9);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret -= 0.002;
warp_8=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`shader_body
comp_6=`{
comp_7=`    uv = 0.05 + 0.9*uv;
comp_8=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_9=`      // SUPER GLOW EDGES - looks awesome w/octopus
comp_10=`      float3 avg_col = GetBlur1(uv);
comp_11=`      ret = abs(avg_col - ret)*6;
comp_12=`    ret *= 1.333; // a little bit of overbright
comp_13=`}
